1.0: Developed and deployed data pipelines using Databricks for large-scale data processing.
1.1: Implemented CI/CD workflows in Jenkins to automate Databricks notebook deployment and job scheduling.
1.2: Designed and deployed Databricks Serving Endpoints for real-time ML model inference using Golang.
1.3: Designed and implemented Python-based machine learning models for pattern recognition and predictive analytics.
1.4: Created automation scripts in Python to preprocess and clean large datasets for AI training.
1.5: Developed deep learning workflows using Python libraries to support natural language processing and computer vision projects.
1.6: Built and maintained Databricks SQL queries, dashboards, and alerting mechanisms for business insights.
1.7: Created AWS Lambda functions to proxy API requests through DynamoDB to Databricks endpoints, enabling secured access.
1.8: Conducted rigorous testing of serving endpoints and Lambda integrations to ensure reliability and performance.

2.0: Built and deployed a Slack bot in Python to automate team workflows and streamline communication within Slack channels.
2.1: Added AI-driven features to the bot, including natural language understanding and decision support to make interactions more intuitive.
2.2: Designed and ran three simulation types to test and model real-world use cases, helping teams visualize different scenarios before rollout.
2.3: Used a GenAI engine to fine-tune performance and generate intelligent insights from complex datasets.
2.4: Leveraged AWS Lambda for serverless execution, which improved scalability and reduced infrastructure overhead.
2.5: Created interactive data visualizations in React and TypeScript, integrating dynamic charts and tables for richer reporting dashboards.
2.6: Added draggable UI cards and other interactive elements to enhance engagement and make interfaces more customizable.
2.7: Implemented WebSockets for real-time client-server communication, ensuring data updates appeared instantly across connected users.

3.0: Built and maintained high-performance applications in Golang and Python, emphasizing scalability, fault tolerance, and real-world reliability.
3.1: Created and maintained Helm charts to simplify containerized deployments across multiple environments, reducing setup complexity for the ops team.
3.2: Automated CI/CD workflows with Jenkins, cutting release times and ensuring consistent deployment quality across services.
3.3: Managed container orchestration and load balancing to guarantee high availability and efficient resource use.
3.4: Integrated JFrog Mission Control for artifact management, improving software distribution and version control across teams.

4.0: Involved in SDLC phases including requirement gathering, data modeling, analysis, architecture design & development of theproject.
4.1: Responsible for developing use cases, sequence diagrams, class diagrams, state chart diagrams using UML notations &Rational Rose.
4.2: Constructed solutions to solve business requirements in an efficient way for e-learning.
4.3: Proposed and led data schema changes of Python/Django application that improved the product with minimum effort tech debts.
4.4: Golang REST API development which is handling different APIs for system management including real-time chat, MySQL & MongoDB management, Zoom, Vimeo, Docusign API integration, security in Linux env.

5.0: Followed Agile methodology to promote development process with 2 weeks of iteration and daily SCRUM meetings throughout the life cycle of the project.
5.1: Involved in implementation of procedures for gathering the requirements from clients for solution demonstrations.
5.2: Migrated the existing python/django application to golang based GRPC.
